Please post feedback on how the game runs on your system to help your fellow gamer and to help us improve our Linux build.

MARI indie GPU requirements will likely experience problems with integrated graphics cards such as the Intel 3000-5000.  Please ensure that your GPU is capable of supporting OpenGL 3.2 or above with at least 1GB of GPU RAM and the latest release drivers installed. Internet connection required to access Steam.
